text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The candidate answer lists several concrete contractual levers the author can negotiate regarding pricing and related terms. Specifically, it mentions: 1) Consultation/approval over price (or setting a price range/floor), 2) Royalty base and rate (including escalators), 3) Promotional discounts and free periods (caps/notice), 4) Minimum price / price floor, and 5) Reversion/termination rights if price harms exploitation. This clearly exceeds the requirement of listing at least three concrete levers.", "criterion_id": "f3a73fbc-9aee-4a68-b68d-4a8cf0c429fd"}
